document_data.mainbody:
eyman Arst was an inhabitant of the Rivington neighborhood of the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Heyman Arst attempted to report that carts of childrens toy donations to be distributed to the refugees of the Absolute crisis had been sabotaged by some bad-faith actors. Despite the claim being true—the toys were rigged to explode using Felogyrs fireworks by the agents of the Absolute in the Cult of Bane—the reports made to Liara Portyrs garrison were dismissed as Heyman Arst failed to provide evidence of his claims.
